original_text: So I stretched out my hand against you and reduced your territory; I gave you over to the greed of your enemies, the daughters of the Philistines, who were shocked by your lewd conduct.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 내 손을 네 위에 펴서 네 일용할 양식을 감하고 너를 미워하는 블레셋 여자 곧 네 더러운 행실을 부끄러워하는 자에게 너를 넘겨 임의로 하게 하였거늘

sentences.original_text: So I stretched out my hand against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 너를 향해 손을 뻗었고

sentences.original_text: I gave you over to the greed of your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 네 원수들의 탐욕에 넘겨주었으니

sentences.original_text: who were shocked by your lewd conduct
